column2: The three State Inquisitors are charged with ensuring the security of the Republic against threats both internal and external.
The High Admiral is formally the chief of the Admiralty and in charge of the Republic's Navy, though he often relies on a competent staff.
The High Judge is the supreme justice of the Republic, who answers only to the Council in most legal matters.
The Father of the Unborn Baby is NOT Known
The Father of the Unborn Baby is Known
Respect is a value based on the age and prestige of a Republican citizen, determining how likely he is to be elected to public offices.

This is the succession type used by Trade Republics and Civil Diœceses. The next ruler is determined from among the heads of the five greatest families depending on age, prestige, and invested civil funds.

Money in the Civil Fund will increase your Respect in the senate and make your candidate more likely to be elected the next $RULER_TITLE$. You can freely adjust the amount until the current $RULER_TITLE$ dies, when the Fund will be used up in the election campaign.

§Y$HEIR$§! is widely expected to succeed §Y$RULER$§!. However, there is always a degree of uncertainty in the elections - to make sure of success, you might want to invest more money than the strict minimum in your civil fund.
With the death of §Y$PATRICIAN$§!, the illustrious republican House §Y$DYNASTY$§! has become extinct.
A great and powerful merchant family has risen to the forefront of $TITLE_ADJ$ politics, under §Y$PATRICIAN$§!.
§Y$NEW_DOGE$§! has been elected $RULER_TITLE$ of the civil Republic of §Y$TITLE$§!.
